name: muon-mockify
description: The easiest way to mockify your project

scripts.clean: rm -rf reports || true; rm -rf node_modules; rm -rf systemtest/node_modules
scripts.systemtest: cd systemtest && npm install &&  (./node_modules/.bin/mocha -C --reporter xunit 1> ../reports/xunit-system.xml || true) && cd ..
scripts.systemsimple: rm -rf systemtest/node_modules && cd systemtest && npm install &&  (./node_modules/.bin/mocha -g '' --reporter dot || true)  && cd ..
scripts.exampletest: cd example && npm install && (./node_modules/.bin/mocha -C --reporter xunit 1> ../reports/xunit-example.xml || true) && cd ..
scripts.examplesimple: cd example && npm install && (./node_modules/.bin/mocha --reporter min || true) && cd ..

author: Sukharev Kirill <SukharevKirill@gmail.com>
